feed.title: Voltaserve Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(shared): add username to Redis config by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/583

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.0.1...v3.0.2

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(misc): support for Apple ecosystem by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/586
  • ci(misc): Docker latest tag points to latest release by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/585
  • feat(idp): simultaneous auth strategies by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/591
  • fix(idp): simultaneous auth strategies by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/592
  • fix(ui): Mosaic permission check by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/593
  • feat(misc): integrate Murph by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/594

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.0.2...v3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Voltaserve: v3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(misc): add Murph .env file by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/595
  • fix(idp): add Deno permissions to Dockerfile by @bouassaba in https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/pull/596

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kouprlabs/voltaserve/compare/v3.1.0...v3.1.1
